name: $addColorStop
description: Adds a color stop to the gradient.

name: $arc
description: Draws a circular arc in the current path.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate of the arc's center.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate of the arc's center.

params.name: startAngle
params.description: The angle at which the arc starts in radians, measured from the positive x-axis.

params.name: endAngle
params.description: The angle at which the arc ends in radians, measured from the positive x-axis.

params.name: counterclockwise
params.description: If true, draws the arc counter-clockwise between the start and end angles.

name: $arcTo
description: Adds a circular arc to the current path.

params.name: x1
params.description: The X coordinate of the first control point.

params.name: y1
params.description: The Y coordinate of the first control point.

params.name: x2
params.description: The X coordinate of the second control point.

params.name: y2
params.description: The Y coordinate of the second control point.

name: $attachCanvas
description: Attaches the canvas.

params.name: canvas
params.description: The name of the canvas to attach.

name: $beginPath
description: Starts a new path by emptying the list of paths.

name: $bezierCurveTo
description: Adds a cubic bezier curve to the currect path.

params.name: startX
params.description: The X coordinate of the start point.

params.name: startY
params.description: The Y coordinate of the start point.

params.name: middleX
params.description: The X coordinate of the mid point.

params.name: middleY
params.description: The Y coordinate of the mid point.

params.name: endX
params.description: The X coordinate of the end point.

params.name: endY
params.description: The Y coordinate of the end point.

name: $canvasSize
description: Returns the canvas size.

name: $canvasTrim
description: Trims the canvas.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to trim.

name: $clearRect
description: Erases pixels in a rect area.

name: $clip
description: Turns the current path into the current clipping region.

name: $closePath
description: Adds a straight line from the current point to the start of the current path.

name: $compositeOperation
description: Sets the type of compositing operation to apply when drawing new shapes.

name: $createCanvas
description: Creates a new canvas.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to create.

name: $deleteCanvas
description: Deletes a canvas.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to delete.

name: $downloadCanvas
description: Downloads the canvas.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to download.

params.name: path
params.description: The download path. (file name and extension)

name: $drawImage
description: Draws an image on the canvas.

params.name: path
params.description: Path or url to the image.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate of the image.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate of the image.

name: $ellipse
description: Adds an elliptical arc to the current path.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate of the elliptical arc.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate of the elliptical arc.

params.name: rotation
params.description: The rotation of the ellipse, expressed in radians.

params.name: startAngle
params.description: The eccentric angle at which the ellipse starts, measured clockwise from the positive x-axis and expressed in radians.

params.name: endAngle
params.description: The eccentric angle at which the ellipse ends, measured clockwise from the positive x-axis and expressed in radians.

params.name: counterclockwise
params.description: If true, draws the ellipse counterclockwise (anticlockwise).

name: $fill
description: Fills the current path.

name: $fillRect
description: Draws a filled rectangle.

params.name: canvas
params.description: The canvas name to draw rect on.

name: $fillText
description: Draws a text.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the fill style in.

params.name: multiline
params.description: Indicates if the text should be drawn in multiple lines if it exceeds the maximum width.

name: $filter
description: Use filters in your canvas.

params.name: canvas
params.description: The name of the canvas to use filters in.

name: $fontFamilies
description: Returns a list of fonts you can use.

name: $getLineDash
description: Returns the line dash pattern used when stroking lines.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the line dash in.

name: $getPixelColors
description: Returns an array of pixels. (their colors)

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to get the pixels from.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

params.name: width
params.description: The width of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

params.name: height
params.description: The height of the rectangle from which the pixel colors will be extracted.

name: $imageSmoothing
description: Enables or disables image smoothing.

params.name: enabled
params.description: Determines whether scaled images are smoothed or not.

name: $letterSpacing
description: Specifies the spacing between letters when drawing text.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the letter spacing in.

name: $lineJoin
description: Sets the shape used to join two line segments where they meet.

name: $lineTo
description: Adds a straight line to the current path.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate of the line's end point.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate of the line's end point.

name: $loadImage
description: Loads an image.

params.name: path
params.description: Path or url to the image.

name: $measureText
description: Measures text.

params.name: canvas
params.description: The name of the canvas to measure text in.

name: $moveTo
description: Begins a new path at the point specified by the given (x, y) coordinates.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to begin a new path in.

name: $newConicGradient
description: Creates a new conic gradient.

params.name: startAngle
params.description: The angle at which to begin the gradient, in radians. The angle starts from a line going horizontally right from the center, and proceeds clockwise.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate of the center of the gradient.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate of the center of the gradient.

name: $newLinearGradient
description: Creates a new linear gradient.

params.name: x1
params.description: The X coordinate of the start point.

params.name: y1
params.description: The Y coordinate of the start point.

params.name: x2
params.description: The X coordinate of the end point.

params.name: y2
params.description: The Y coordinate of the end point.

name: $newRadialGradient
description: Creates a new radial gradient.

params.name: x1
params.description: The X coordinate of the start circle.

params.name: y1
params.description: The Y coordinate of the start circle.

params.name: r1
params.description: The radius of the start circle.

params.name: x2
params.description: The X coordinate of the end circle.

params.name: y2
params.description: The Y coordinate of the end circle.

params.name: r2
params.description: The radius of the end circle.

name: $opacity
description: Gets or sets the opacity in the canvas.

params.name: canvas
params.description: The name of the canvas to get or set the opacity in.

name: $putPixelsColors
description: Places the pixel colors in the canvas.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to place the pixels in.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate at which to place the pixel colors in the canvas.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate at which to place the pixel colors in the canvas.

params.name: width
params.description: Width of the rectangle to be painted.

params.name: height
params.description: Height of the rectangle to be painted.

name: $quadraticCurveTo
description: Adds a quadratic bezier curve to the currect path.

params.name: startX
params.description: The X coordinate of the start point.

params.name: startY
params.description: The Y coordinate of the start point.

params.name: endX
params.description: The X coordinate of the end point.

params.name: endY
params.description: The Y coordinate of the end point.

name: $rect
description: Draws a rectangle in the current path. (not filled or stroked)

name: $registerFont
description: Registers a font.
example:
### Loading a font
```aoi
$registerFont[./fonts/Arial.ttf;Arial]
```

### Loading fonts from a directory
```aoi
$registerFont[./fonts]
```

name: $resetTransform
description: Resets the current transform to the identity matrix.

name: $resizeCanvas
description: Resizes the canvas.

params.name: canvas
params.description: The name of the canvas to resize.

name: $restore
description: Restores the most recently saved canvas state.

name: $rotation
description: Sets the rotation in the canvas.

name: $save
description: Saves the entire state of the canvas by pushing the current state onto a stack.

name: $scale
description: Adds a scaling transformation to the canvas units horizontally and/or vertically.

params.name: x
params.description: Scaling factor in the horizontal direction. A value of 1 results in no horizontal scaling.

params.name: y
params.description: Scaling factor in the vertical direction. A value of 1 results in no vertical scaling.

name: $setLineDash
description: Sets the line dash pattern used when stroking lines. It uses an array of values that specify alternating lengths of lines and gaps which describe the pattern.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the line dash in.

params.name: segments
params.description: An array of numbers that specify distances to alternately draw a line and a gap (in coordinate space units).

name: $setShadow
description: Sets the shadow (blur, style, offset) in a canvas.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the shadow in.

name: $setTransform
description: Resets (overrides) the current transformation to the identity matrix, and then invokes a transformation described by the arguments of this method.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the transformation in.

params.name: a
params.description: The cell in the first row and first column of the matrix.

params.name: b
params.description: The cell in the second row and first column of the matrix.

params.name: c
params.description: The cell in the first row and second column of the matrix.

params.name: d
params.description: The cell in the second row and second column of the matrix.

params.name: e
params.description: The cell in the first row and third column of the matrix.

params.name: f
params.description: The cell in the second row and third column of the matrix.

name: $stroke
description: Strokes (outlines) the current path.

name: $strokeRect
description: Draws a stroked (outlined) rectangle.

params.name: canvas
params.description: The canvas name to draw rect on.

name: $strokeText
description: Draws a stroked (outlined) text.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to draw the text on.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate of the text.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate of the text.

params.name: multiline
params.description: Indicates if the text should be drawn in multiple lines if it exceeds the maximum width.

name: $transform
description: Multiplies the current transformation with the matrix described by the arguments of this method.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to transform.

params.name: a
params.description: The cell in the first row and first column of the matrix.

params.name: b
params.description: The cell in the second row and first column of the matrix.

params.name: c
params.description: The cell in the first row and second column of the matrix.

params.name: d
params.description: The cell in the second row and second column of the matrix.

params.name: e
params.description: The cell in the first row and third column of the matrix.

params.name: f
params.description: The cell in the second row and third column of the matrix.

name: $translate
description: Adds a translation transformation.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to add a translation transformation in.

params.name: x
params.description: Distance to move in the horizontal direction. positive = right, negative = left.

params.name: y
params.description: Distance to move in the vertical direction. positive = right, negative = left.

name: $wordSpacing
description: Specifies the spacing between words when drawing text.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Name of the canvas to set the word spacing in.

name: $addFrame
description: Adds a frame to the GIF.

name: $attachGIF
description: Attaches the GIF.

name: $createGIF
description: Creates a new GIF.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the GIF to create.

name: $deleteGIF
description: Deletes a GIF.

name: $getFrames
description: Extracts frames from a gif.

params.name: amount
params.description: The amount of frames to extract.

name: $gifFinish
description: Finishes the gif.

name: $setDelay
description: Sets the GIF display frame delay.

params.name: delay
params.description: Number of milliseconds to display frame

name: $setFPS
description: Sets the FPS (Frames Per Second) of a GIF.

params.name: frames
params.description: Number of frames per second to display.

name: $setQuality
description: Sets the GIF color quality.

name: $setRepeat
description: Sets the number of loops GIF does.

name: $setThreshold
description: Sets if the color table should be reused if current frame matches previous frame.

name: $canvasVersion
description: Returns the aoi.canvas version.

name: $imageSize
description: Returns an image size.

params.name: src
params.description: Path or url to the image.

params.name: property
params.description: The image size property to return.
